name: weather-agent-backend
description: Mastra backend server for weather agent with MCP tools

scripts.build: npm run test && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 npm run compile
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run typecheck
scripts.start: if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ]; then node dist/index.js; else npm run dev; fi
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start:production
scripts.test:agent: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-weather-agent.ts
scripts.test:claude: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-claude.ts
scripts.test:stt: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-stt.ts
scripts.test:tts: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-tts.ts
